hero.title: Research
hero.subtitle: Pioneering research in machine vision and optical sensing for agriculture

researchAreas.title: Hyperspectral Imaging

images.alt: Hyperspectral imaging system analyzing soybean leaves
Hyperspectral data cube visualization showing spectral bands

researchAreas.description: Advanced hyperspectral imaging techniques for early detection of crop diseases and stress conditions. Our research focuses on developing algorithms that can identify subtle spectral signatures indicating plant health issues before they become visible to the naked eye.

researchAreas.title: Agricultural Robotics
researchAreas.description: Development of autonomous robotic systems for precision agriculture applications. Our robots are equipped with advanced sensors and AI capabilities to perform tasks such as crop monitoring, targeted spraying, and data collection.
features: See and spray for precision weed management

researchAreas.title: Machine Learning & AI

images.alt: AI-powered weed detection system with real-time classification
AI plant measurement and phenotyping system

researchAreas.description: Implementation of cutting-edge machine learning and artificial intelligence techniques for agricultural applications. Our AI models can process complex visual data to make intelligent decisions about crop management and field operations.

researchAreas.title: Drone Technology

images.alt: Agricultural drone conducting field monitoring and data collection

researchAreas.description: Integration of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) with advanced imaging systems for large-scale field monitoring. Our drone platforms provide high-resolution data collection capabilities for precision agriculture applications.

researchAreas.title: High Throughput Phenotyping

images.alt: High throughput phenotyping system in greenhouse environment

researchAreas.description: Advanced high-throughput phenotyping systems for comprehensive crop characterization and breeding acceleration. Our platforms integrate 3D crop phenotyping, multi-spectral imaging, and automated measurement systems to capture detailed plant traits at scale.

researchAreas.title: Data Analytics

images.alt: Machine learning model performance analysis showing MSE comparison across different algorithms
PCA projection analysis showing principal components and explained variance for data classification

researchAreas.description: Advanced data processing and analysis techniques for agricultural data interpretation, pattern recognition, and decision support systems. We develop scalable analytics platforms that transform raw sensor data into actionable insights.

currentProjects.title: Soybean Disease Detection
currentProjects.description: Developing AI-powered systems for early detection of sudden death syndrome in soybean crops using hyperspectral imaging technology.

currentProjects.title: Autonomous Field Robots
currentProjects.description: Creating cost-effective robotic platforms for small-scale farmers to monitor crop health and perform precision agriculture tasks.

currentProjects.title: Pepper Phenotyping
currentProjects.description: High-throughput phenotyping of pepper varieties using machine vision to accelerate breeding programs and improve crop yields.

currentProjects.title: Corn Nitrogen Management using Hyperspectral and AI in Greenhouse
currentProjects.description: Utilizing hyperspectral imaging and artificial intelligence to optimize nitrogen management in corn crops within controlled greenhouse environments for enhanced nutrient efficiency.

currentProjects.title: Corn Nitrogen Management using Hyperspectral and AI in Fields
currentProjects.description: Implementing field-scale hyperspectral imaging and AI algorithms to monitor and manage nitrogen levels in corn crops for improved yield and reduced environmental impact.

currentProjects.title: 3D Phenotyping of Soybean in Greenhouse
currentProjects.description: Advanced 3D phenotyping systems for comprehensive characterization of soybean plant architecture and growth patterns in controlled greenhouse environments.

currentProjects.title: Robotic See and Spray for Precision Weed Management
currentProjects.description: Development of autonomous robotic systems equipped with computer vision for real-time weed detection and targeted herbicide application in agricultural fields.

currentProjects.title: Drone Spray Pattern Analysis under Various Canopy Structures
currentProjects.description: Analyzing spray pattern distribution and coverage efficiency of agricultural drones across different crop canopy structures to optimize application strategies.

currentProjects.title: Pepper Pose Estimation for Robotic Harvester using AI
currentProjects.description: Developing AI-powered computer vision systems for accurate pose estimation and orientation detection of peppers to enable precise robotic harvesting operations.
